Scientific Projects

  • QuickBlast - Simple script to perform multiple BLASTP searches against a custom database

Fun Projects

  • SpaceWebRadio - Small web radio application for a Raspberry Pi
  • WaterMeButton - Hacking an Amazon Dash Button to remind you to water your plants!
  • FM4_dl - Automatic downloader for FM4 radio shows
  • Rack Designer - Short script to automatically design 3D models for racks
